name: Subterranean Excavation
description:
In Subterranean Excavation you play as a miner trapped underground.

The goal of the game is for the player to escape by climbing the floors while there are dangerous poison rooms around. The find out where about the poison rooms are the miner is equipped with  cards that will look at the next "X" amount of rooms on the card and tell the you how many poison rooms are located in that range. When using these cards they will be removed until the round is over. Use strategy to learn where the poison rooms are and avoid them. 

To assist you the player can enter the shop and buy items (Mask, Burn and Search)

-Mask will give you another life if you draw a poison card destroying the mask in the process 

-Burn will destroy the top card on the deck

-Search will let you look at the top card on the deck 

To interact with the game use the left mouse button
